Text: Guckkasten (Korean: 국카스텐 ) is a South Korean indie rock band.

Text: Guckkasten:  Formed in 2003 under the name The C.O.M. (더 컴), the original lineup consisted of vocalist Ha Hyun-woo, guitarist Jeon Kyu-ho, drummer Lee Jung-gil, and bassist Kim Jin-eok.
